Fifth row: polis akademisi from Ankara uses bel - pa again. That's a third club using the arena.

Sixth row: anka sk, also in Ankara, plays at bel - pa. So that's four clubs using it.

So from this, I can see that out of six clubs, only two (istanbul paten and kocaeli bb kağıt) don't use the "bel - pa" arena. That matches exactly with what the claim states: two clubs didn't play at bel - pa. 

Therefore, the claim is TRUE because there are indeed two clubs that didn't use the specified arena.
